_sText:
Players will all spawn with 1 health and a smoke grenade. Peg the enemy with a smoke grenade to kill him.

Extra smoke grenades (blue lights) and flash bangs (red lights) are scattered across the map.

Happy throwing!

**NOTE** AS OF THE RECENT CHANGES TO THE WAY AMMO WORKS IN CSS, THIS MAP IS BROKEN. All players start with full shotgun ammo instead of only one clip.
